resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Data Storage Information:
We do not store any data into the local storage of your android device. All data is directly received from the server.

Server Connection
The connection with the server is done through a secure SSL and therefore cannot be compromised.

Encryption
The sensitive data used and transmitted from and to this app is secured through end-to-end encryption.

By agreeing to the terms and services you give full consent to this application to make use of the private data provided by you regarding pictures of you taken from professors. From our part of agreement we encrypt your image data such that it is invisible for us as well to ensure that your private information is not breached
